DOC.brief_summary: By doing this study, researchers hope to learn if older adults with and without cognitive impairment can adhere to a Mediterranean diet.
DOC.brief_title: Feasibility Trial of a Mediterranean Diet Pattern to Prevent Cognitive Decline
DOC.detailed_description: Participants will be given instruction on following the study designed Mediterranean diet. Participation in the study will last about 9 weeks. Each person will be asked to follow the study diet for 6 weeks. During the study, participants will be asked to track the food they eat and will be monitored by a registered dietitian. Potential participants need to be located within the KC metro area.
DOC.criteria: Cognitively normal older adults over the age of 65 or individuals with a diagnosis of MCI or AD (any age) Have a study partner, if diagnosed with MCI or AD Body mass index (BMI) range between 20 35 kg/m2 Speak English as a primary language Serious medical risk Adherence to specialized diet regimes Already consume a Mediterranean diet pattern
